channel.title: Australasian Applied Statistics Conference
channel.description: Recent content on Australasian Applied Statistics Conference

item.title: AASC2020 coming to Victoria
item.description: At AASC2018, Rotorua, New Zealand, it was decided that the next Australiasia Applied Statistics Conference will be held in Victoria. Murray Hannah will chair this next AASC.

item.title: Register your interest
item.description: To be notified of future updates about AASC2020, please fill out the form here.

item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: The organizers of AASC2020 are dedicated to providing a harassment-free conference experience for everyone regardless of gender, gender expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion (or lack thereof). All attendees, speakers, sponsors and volunteers at AASC2020 are required to agree to the following code of conduct. Organizers will enforce this code throughout and expect cooperation in ensuring a safe environment for all. We do not tolerate harassment of AASC2020 participants in any form.

item.title: Contact
item.description: AASC Organising Committee Murray Hannah (DEDJTR, Chair) Khageswor Giri (DEDJTR, Secretary) Andrew Van Burgel (DPIRD) Debra L Partington (DEDJTR) Donghui Ma (VSN) Emi Tanaka (Monash) Kym L Butler (DEDJTR) Sorn Norng (DEDJTR) Subhash Chandra (DEDJTR)

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Do I have to register for the conference to sign up for the workshop? No. You can register for the workshop alone.
